DOC.brief_title: A Blind , Randomized Controlled Study Live Attenuated Varicella Vaccines
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize , blind , control phase III clinical trial . The purpose study evaluate protective effect , safety immunogenicity live attenuate varicella vaccine manufacture Sinovac ( Dalian ) Vaccine Technology Co. , Ltd . The control diluent lyophilize vaccine manufacture Sinovac ( Dalian ) Vaccine Technology Co. , Ltd. All participant healthy , randomly assign experimental group control group ratio 1:1 .
